title: Mindslayers

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Mindslayers are a race of intelligent, tree-like humanoids, located in the realm of Zanaris. Very few members of this race appear in-game. Whilst the Mindslayers are not referenced by this name by any NPC, this name was revealed by Mod Biscuits on the Official RuneScape Forums.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Mindslayers

The Mindslayers are a race of intelligent, tree-like humanoids, located in the realm of Zanaris. Very few members of this race appear in-game. Whilst the Mindslayers are not referenced by this name by any NPC, this name was revealed by Mod Biscuits on the Official RuneScape Forums.

The only Mindslayers to appear in-game have taken on the job of the Gatekeepers of Zanaris, guarding the entrances to the Zanaris Market and the Shady grove, the lair of Tanglefoot and Baby tanglefootii. In-game, they are merely referred to as Gatekeepers.

Notable Mindslayers[edit | edit source]

There are currently only five Mindslayers which appear in-game:

  • The four Gatekeepers who guard the Zanaris Marketplace, charging one cut diamond to pass.
  • The lone Gatekeeper who guards the entrance to the Shady grove.

History and biology[edit | edit source]

Not much is known about the Mindslayers, and their role in the history, and day-to-day workings, of Zanaris, although their primary role seems to be that of Gatekeepers. The Mindslayers have a tree-like appearance, and are probably quite in tune with nature, much like the nearby fairies. They seem to have quite large families, and are capable of breeding with Humans, evidenced when one of the four market guards claims the Old Man who used to guard the market gates was his father.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • A mindslayer resembles a race called the Illithid (often called mindflayers) from the game Dungeons & Dragons.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
[[File:Gatekeeper chathead.png|left|Gatekeeper]]
The '''Mindslayers''' are a [[race]] of intelligent, tree-like humanoids, located in the realm of [[Zanaris]]. Very few members of this race appear in-game. Whilst the Mindslayers are not referenced by this name by any [[NPC]], this name was revealed by Mod Biscuits on the [[Official RuneScape Forums]].

The only Mindslayers to appear in-game have taken on the job of the [[Gatekeeper]]s of Zanaris, guarding the entrances to the [[Zanaris Market]] and the [[Shady grove]], the lair of [[Tanglefoot]] and [[Baby tanglefoot]]ii. In-game, they are merely referred to as '''Gatekeepers'''.

==Notable Mindslayers==
There are currently only five Mindslayers which appear in-game:
*The four Gatekeepers who guard the Zanaris Marketplace, charging one cut [[diamond]] to pass.
*The lone Gatekeeper who guards the entrance to the Shady grove.

==History and biology==
Not much is known about the Mindslayers, and their role in the history, and day-to-day workings, of Zanaris, although their primary role seems to be that of Gatekeepers. The Mindslayers have a tree-like appearance, and are probably quite in tune with nature, much like the nearby [[Fairy|fairies]]. They seem to have quite large families, and are capable of breeding with [[Human]]s, evidenced when one of the four market guards claims the Old Man who used to guard the market gates was his father.

==Trivia==
*A mindslayer resembles a race called the Illithid (often called mindflayers) from the game ''{{wp|Dungeons & Dragons}}''.
